subject: Language Arts
topic: Reading Comprehension: Main Idea and Supporting Details
title: Finding the Main Idea
learningObjectives: Determine the main idea of a text.
Explain how the main idea is supported by key details.
Summarize a text by identifying the main idea and key details.

content.body: The main idea is the most important point the author is trying to make. Supporting details are facts and examples that explain the main idea.

content.alt: A diagram showing a main idea with several supporting details branching off.

content.body: To find the main idea, look at the title, headings, and the first and last sentences of a paragraph. Ask yourself, "What is this text mostly about?"

questions.question: What is the main idea of a text?
What is the purpose of supporting details?

content.body: La idea principal es el punto más importante que el autor intenta comunicar. Los detalles de apoyo son hechos y ejemplos que explican la idea principal.

¿Cuál es el propósito de los detalles de apoyo?
